languages.text: Как только пустотники начали заваривать шлюз, из-за него раздался душераздирающий плач, а в щели поползли тончайшие ростки. Однако преданность Вольному Торговцу и вера в Императора помогла довести работу до конца. Лишь покинув Имматериум, экипаж перестал слышать дьявольские стенания.

traits.locale_text: Как только пустотники начали заваривать шлюз, из-за него раздался душераздирающий плач, а в щели поползли тончайшие ростки. Однако преданность Вольному Торговцу и вера в Императора помогла довести работу до конца. Лишь покинув Имматериум, экипаж перестал слышать дьявольские стенания.

languages.text: As soon as the voidsmen started welding the chamber shut, a heartbreaking cry rang out and green shoots burst out of the gap. However, the crew's loyalty to the Rogue Trader and their unshakeable faith in the God-Emperor spurred them to finish the task. Only when the ship left the Immaterium did the diabolic moaning subside.
languages.original_text: Как только пустотники начали заваривать шлюз, из-за него раздался душераздирающий плач, а в щели поползли тончайшие ростки. Однако преданность Вольному Торговцу и вера в Императора помогла довести работу до конца. Лишь покинув Имматериум, экипаж перестал слышать дьявольские стенания.

traits.locale_text: As soon as the voidsmen started welding the chamber shut, a heartbreaking cry rang out and green shoots burst out of the gap. However, the crew's loyalty to the Rogue Trader and the unshakable faith in the God-Emperor helped them finish the job. Only when the ship left the Immaterium did the diabolic moaning subside.

As soon as the voidsmen started welding the chamber shut, a heartbreaking cry rang out and green shoots burst out of the gap. However, the crew's loyalty to the Rogue Trader and the unshakable faith in the God-Emperor helped them finish the job. Only when the ship left the Immaterium did the diabolic moaning subside.

However, the crew's loyalty to the Rogue Trader and their unshakable faith in the God-Emperor spurred them to finish the task. Only when the ship left the Immaterium did the diabolic moaning subside.

As soon as the voidsmen started welding the chamber shut, a heartbreaking cry rang out and green shoots burst out of the gap. However, the crew's loyalty to the Rogue Trader and their unshakeable faith in the God-Emperor spurred them to finish the task. Only when the ship left the Immaterium did the diabolic moaning subside.

As soon as the voidsmen started welding the chamber shut, a heartbreaking cry rang out and green shoots burst out of the gap. However, the crew's loyalty to the Rogue Trader and their unshakeable faith in the God-Emperor spurred them to finish the task. Only when the ship left the Immaterium did the diabolic moaning subside.

languages.text: 当工人们开始用电焊焊死舱门时，舱室里响起了令人心碎的哭喊声，绿色的嫩芽从舱口冒了出来。然而，船员们秉承着对行商浪人的忠诚，以及对神皇的坚定信仰，最终还是完成了这个任务。直到舰船离开亚空间之后，恐怖的呻吟声才安静下来。
languages.original_text: As soon as the voidsmen started welding the chamber shut, a heartbreaking cry rang out and green shoots burst out of the gap. However, the crew's loyalty to the Rogue Trader and their unshakeable faith in the God-Emperor spurred them to finish the task. Only when the ship left the Immaterium did the diabolic moaning subside.

traits.locale_text: 当工人们开始用电焊焊死舱门时，舱室里响起了令人心碎的哭喊声，绿色的嫩芽从舱口冒了出来。然而，船员们秉承着对行商浪人的忠诚，以及对神皇的坚定信仰，最终还是完成了这个任务。直到舰船离开亚空间之后，恐怖的呻吟声才安静下来。

languages.text: En cuanto los soldados del vacío empezaron a soldar la cámara, se oyó un grito desgarrador y unos brotes verdes salieron por el hueco. Sin embargo, la lealtad de la tripulación {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente y su fe inquebrantable en el Dios Emperador les impulsaron a terminar la tarea. Solo cuando la nave abandonó el Inmaterio cesaron los gemidos diabólicos.
languages.original_text: As soon as the voidsmen started welding the chamber shut, a heartbreaking cry rang out and green shoots burst out of the gap. However, the crew's loyalty to the Rogue Trader and their unshakeable faith in the God-Emperor spurred them to finish the task. Only when the ship left the Immaterium did the diabolic moaning subside.

traits.locale_text: En cuanto los soldados del vacío empezaron a soldar la cámara, se oyó un grito desgarrador y unos brotes verdes salieron por el hueco. Sin embargo, la lealtad de la tripulación {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente y su fe inquebrantable en el Dios Emperador les impulsaron a terminar la tarea. Solo cuando la nave abandonó el Inmaterio cesaron los gemidos diabólicos.

languages.text: ヴォイズマンが部屋を溶接して閉じようとした瞬間、悲痛な叫び声が響き渡り、若芽が隙間から飛び出した。しかし、クルーの自由開拓者に対する忠誠心と神帝陛下への揺るぎない信仰心が、任務遂行へとクルーを駆り立てる。船が非物質世界を去って初めて、悪魔のうめき声は静まった。
languages.original_text: As soon as the voidsmen started welding the chamber shut, a heartbreaking cry rang out and green shoots burst out of the gap. However, the crew's loyalty to the Rogue Trader and their unshakeable faith in the God-Emperor spurred them to finish the task. Only when the ship left the Immaterium did the diabolic moaning subside.

traits.locale_text: ヴォイズマンが部屋を溶接して閉じようとした瞬間、悲痛な叫び声が響き渡り、若芽が隙間から飛び出した。しかし、クルーの自由開拓者に対する忠誠心と神帝陛下への揺るぎない信仰心が、任務遂行へとクルーを駆り立てる。船が非物質世界を去って初めて、悪魔のうめき声は静まった。

languages.text: Au moment où les cosmomarins commencent à souder les portes de la salle, un cri déchirant retentit et des pousses vertes jaillissent de la brèche, mais le loyal équipage fait confiance au jugement {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} et leur foi inébranlable envers l'Empereur-Dieu les incite à terminer le travail. Ce n'est que lorsque le vaisseau quitte l'Immaterium que les gémissements diaboliques s'éteignent.
languages.original_text: As soon as the voidsmen started welding the chamber shut, a heartbreaking cry rang out and green shoots burst out of the gap. However, the crew's loyalty to the Rogue Trader and their unshakeable faith in the God-Emperor spurred them to finish the task. Only when the ship left the Immaterium did the diabolic moaning subside.

traits.locale_text: Au moment où les cosmomarins commencent à souder les portes de la salle, un cri déchirant retentit et des pousses vertes jaillissent de la brèche, mais le loyal équipage fait confiance au jugement {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} et leur foi inébranlable envers l'Empereur-Dieu les incite à terminer le travail. Ce n'est que lorsque le vaisseau quitte l'Immaterium que les gémissements diaboliques s'éteignent.

languages.text: Sobald die Raumfahrer beginnen, die Kammer zuzuschweißen, ertönt ein herzzerreißender Schrei und grüne Sprossen schießen aus der Lücke. Doch die Loyalität der Crew gegenüber {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} sowie ihr unerschütterlicher Glaube an den Gottimperator treiben sie an, die Aufgabe zu beenden. Erst, als das Schiff, das Immaterium verlässt, verstummt das diabolische Stöhnen in der Kammer.
languages.original_text: As soon as the voidsmen started welding the chamber shut, a heartbreaking cry rang out and green shoots burst out of the gap. However, the crew's loyalty to the Rogue Trader and their unshakeable faith in the God-Emperor spurred them to finish the task. Only when the ship left the Immaterium did the diabolic moaning subside.

traits.locale_text: Sobald die Raumfahrer beginnen, die Kammer zuzuschweißen, ertönt ein herzzerreißender Schrei und grüne Sprossen schießen aus der Lücke. Doch die Loyalität der Crew gegenüber {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} sowie ihr unerschütterlicher Glaube an den Gottimperator treiben sie an, die Aufgabe zu beenden. Erst, als das Schiff, das Immaterium verlässt, verstummt das diabolische Stöhnen in der Kammer.

languages.text: Uçsuz erleri odayı kapatmaya başladığında yürek burkan bir çığlık duyuldu ve aralıktan yeşil filizler fışkırdı. Buna rağmen mürettebatın Hür Tacir'e bağlılığı ve Tanrı İmparator'a olan sarsılmaz inancı, görevlerini tamamlamalarını sağladı. Geminin Tindiyar'dan çıkmasıyla şeytani iniltiler nihayet kesildi.
languages.original_text: As soon as the voidsmen started welding the chamber shut, a heartbreaking cry rang out and green shoots burst out of the gap. However, the crew's loyalty to the Rogue Trader and their unshakeable faith in the God-Emperor spurred them to finish the task. Only when the ship left the Immaterium did the diabolic moaning subside.
